text: Raúl "Chato" Padilla Mendoza (June 17, 1918 – February 3, 1994) was a Mexican actor. He was known for his role as Jaimito, el Cartero ("Jaimito, the Mailman") in El Chavo del Ocho.Chaves: foi sem querer querendo? - Page 166 "Raúl Chato Padilla (17/6/1918 - 3/2/1994) O ator Raúl “Chato” Padilla nasceu na cidade mexicana de Monterrey, no ano de 1918. Antes de fazer parte do elenco de Chaves, construiu uma grande carreira no cinema cômico mexicano." Padilla died in Mexico City, Mexico from a heart attack, aged 75. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Actors from Monterrey
title: Raúl Padilla
